get.description: Get campaigns bound to an organization Description: This method gets a list of campaigns bound to an organization The pattern is GET: api/config/organizations/{organizationId}/campaigns - Security: The client must be logged. The request object must have an Authorization header with a valid Bearer access token - Parameter needed in the URL - organizationId: The organization id - Information needed in the request HEADER - tenantId: the tenant id - Information needed in the request BODY - None - Information received in the response BODY - campaigns: A list of bound campaigns

Get organizations bound to a campaign Description: This method gets all organizations bound to a campaign The pattern is GET: api/config/campaigns/{campaignId}/organizations - Security: The client must be logged. The request object must have an Authorization header with a valid Bearer access token - Parameter needed in the URL - campaignId: The campaign id - Information needed in the request HEADER - tenantId: the tenant id - Information needed in the request BODY - None - Information received in the response BODY - organizations: A list of bound organizations
